pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Testing Through Joint Resampling-Based Tests // Runs resampling-based tests jointly, e.g., sign-flip score tests from Hemerik et al., (2020) doi:10.1111/rssb.12369, to allow for multivariate testing, i.e., weak and strong control of the Familywise Error Rate or True Discovery Proportion.
